name: Work To live Demo
description:
A small minigame of what is going to be a much more extensive video game, this explores various unconventional works, due to the limited time of the Jam we cannot present the entire project, but if we can leave a playable part, we hope that it enjoy it
controls
movement: W, A, S, D
attack: space bar
once the zombies come out of the coffin don't worry and go for the others
